title: (x) Budweiser script - custom (\> Brewmaster Modern) {Chesh}
content:
Custom typeface perhaps? Any ideas? Sorry the B got cut off I'll try to post a better image. Thanks in advance.   
   
 ![Budweiser Script gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32383.gif)

 [‹ (x) Nissan AG - Akzidenz Grotesk Extended {Franz, Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4253 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) LandAmerica Commonwealth - Verdana (squooshed) {Richard} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4235 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Here's a closeup of the B.   
   
   
 ![Budweiser B](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32386.jpg)
Hmmm...something fishy about someone named Miller looking for the Budweiser font... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Most likely it's custom, but the lower-case is not extremely distinctive -- many formal scripts have similar forms. Check out [Mike Yanega's site](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script01Pg1.html) for a selection. There's nothing there, though, that remotely looks like the Budweiser B. If all you need is a clean version of the logo, though, go to [Brands of the World](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659/http:/web.brandsoftheworld.com/?id=112&query_id=3139212&page=1&brand_id=26990). You can also do a search there for Budweiser and find a lot of Bud logos.   
   
(And Miller ones, too!)
Just found [Brewmaster Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603080659/http:/www.fontmesa.com/brewmaster.htm): a font created to look like the Budweiser script. It may be useful to you.
